name: Nature s Secrets Citrus Body Wash
description: This citrus moisturising body wash with natural tangerine extract provides a refreshing burst of freshness to revive your senses and leave you delightfully scented. Enriched with tangerine’s natural antioxidants and powerful moisturisers, this soap-free body wash leaves your skin clean, hydrated and nourished. A skin-friendly pH prevents skin dryness. No artificial colours used. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
